website_summaries.verdict: Solid price point for beginners with a useful selection of clubs that also includes a golf bag.
pros: Includes a driver, a fairway wood, a hybrid wood, 5-irons, a putter, headcovers, and a bag
Offered with both left- and right-handed options
Lightweight bag that stands up to tough conditions better than most
Irons have a nice design to help your swing stay on track
cons: Really only aimed at beginning golfers

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Club Head Broke off in Full Swing
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason you don't see the Callaway name anywhere on these clubs or bag. I wouldn't want to have my name on them either. These clubs look great but are just poorly made and dangerous. I bought these for my 18 year old son and the first time at the range the 3 wood head flew off a full swing. This could have seriously injured someone. Needless to say these are junk and are going right back to Amazon. The Callaway Golf company should be ashamed of themselves for putting such a dangerous inferior product out on the market.
customer_reviews.author: RPD New Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Good set to build on!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for a beginner's set. The irons are excellent; as well as the putter. The driver and 3 is a little weak; but I like the hybrid included. Great bag...also includes 2 head covers. I replaced the driver with an upgrade, as soon as I got it...grips are good. I don't see too many sets in the $200 range that offer this much. If you're just starting out and/or don't play a whole lot of golf, this is a great value...I will be upgrading my fairway wood and adding a few more clubs, but this is a great set.
customer_reviews.author: indianscoach

customer_reviews.title: Best game ever
customer_reviews.text: I played golf years ago with a set of clubs I picked up at the military exchange, couldn't keep the ball in the fairway to save my life. The ad for these clubs said they were designed to help new players hit correctly and were more forgiving than other clubs, they are. Had the best 18 of my life the first time I played with them! Made me actually enjoy playing. I would recommend them to any new player!
customer_reviews.author: Rene R.

customer_reviews.title: DRIVERS ARE CHEAPLY MADE. Irons are ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on Prime Day as a starter set. Initially, thought the quality was great. Finally had the time this weekend to try them out at the local driving range, when 30 swings in the head of the 3-Woods snapped clean off (See picture). Immediately went to check the other clubs, and found that the driver had a dent in it as well. Yes, they are cheap clubs, but CHEAPLY MADE clubs. Pity that I used these outside of the 30-day window, because now I can't get them replaced. Be forewarned: sleek looking clubs, but quality does not match.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Only reason for 4 stars is the set needed a sand wedge. Other than that I am using everything except the diver, and I am using a Callaway Big Bertha V Series for that. This is a great low cost set, and I especially like the 5 hybrid. Quality seems higher than expected for this nice set of clubs, especially since they are by Callaway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "12 piece set"
customer_reviews.text: This is a 9 piece set. It says 12 but it counts the bag and the driver/3 wood cover as pieces. It is missing iron's 3 through 5. Still good for the price, but just pointing it out so you know you're getting 9 clubs not 12.
customer_reviews.author: Payam

customer_reviews.title: Brakes on first contact
customer_reviews.text: The woods in this set will fracture on contact. First time out all 3 woods dented from making contact with the ball. Why would a company endorse such a low grade product. Never buy Strata again
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set about a year ago. I don’t play golf that often so thought this might be a good set with the good reviews. Well I now no longer have a driver or a 3 wood as all three heads have come off as I was swinging the club. Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: murphy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price...!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a new set of golf clubs. These are a second set I keep down south so I don't have to lug my clubs back and forth on the airlines. The set is complete with carry bag and all. My other set are Ping and I shoot the same no matter which set I use My handicap is not improved by more expensive clubs😆
customer_reviews.author: PGC

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner set. I recently started playing golf and wanted to find a nice set of clubs that I could learn to play with. I have been using them for about 6 months and don't have any complaints yet. They're a great set for anyone just starting to learn how to golf.
customer_reviews.author: Nate R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome golf set
customer_reviews.text: Awesome golf set! I played at a course in Florida where they had $1,200 rental sets (they didn't cost that much to rent...that's how much they would have cost to buy as a set). These clubs outplayed those sets. I can hit these clubs well. Very nice! I am very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Conner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beginner clubs!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pair of begging golf clubs. The clubs are well packaged and come protected as expected. All the clubs seem well made, with some slight aesthetic imperfections but compared to more expensive clubs you can expect somethings to be skewed. The feel in hand is great, the grips are tacky and give you a reference as to where the club is facing, the swing and feel of contact is great. The only downfall is that the bag seems a little on the cheap side but well made with plenty of good features (e.i. the pop stands, lots of pockets etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who is new to golfing. I did the research, and this set is a good starter set. My son uses them all the time, and now that he’s getting good at golf he is looking to upgrade a few of the clubs. The nice thing is, he can do it as needed, one at a time. And I can find out what he wants and have birthday and Christmas gifts for him for a while. (Guys are so hard to buy for!) Recommend for beginners or as a starter set. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Finn

customer_reviews.title: Broken and bent clubs after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the set for a Christmas present for a beginning golfer, seemed like a good value set from a name brand, quality manufacturer. So far, the first time at the driving range, a club head broke off the 3 wood; now I am hearing after my son's first time on a course, the Driver is bent. I have purchased other sets with similar features that have lasted 3-5 years before it was just time to get a new set. I was hoping this set might last a couple seasons and my son could try out for the high school golf team with them. Now I need to replace 2 clubs within the first 2 uses. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for beginners and intermediate
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. It is not a full set, but honestly I don't miss the other clubs. Quality is very good, the bag is well made with a myriad of pockets and thoughtful little design choices. Been playing for a few years now and can highly recommend for beginners and intermediate alike.
customer_reviews.author: Buffer

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with them.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve played golf for about ten years, but i’m a casual golfer. I purchased these clubs because i was still using a junior set and I’m not ready to invest in a high dollar set at this point. I’ve played probably four times with this set so far. I’ve really enjoyed them and they seem well made. That being said, I can definitely tell a difference in distance between my dads Cobra irons and these irons. I also wouldn’t recommend these for anyone much over 6’. I’m 6’1 and these are very close to being too short, in my opinion. Overall, I would not hesitate to recommend giving these a try! Especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Driver caved in. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: First trip to the golf course, I tee’d up and then smacked the ball. The club face of my driver dented in. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice clubs, EXCELLENT value!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to golf and didn't want to spend a ton of money on equipment in case I didn't really like it (or never get very good at it). Used clubs are harder to find for a lefty. This Callaway Men's Strata Complete Golf Set I found on Amazon was "Renewed/Refurbished" and not much more than a set of decent used clubs so I bought them. The only thing "renewed" about these clubs was the busted up box they came in. Otherwise, brand new. Still had the shrink wrap on the club heads. The bag is not "like new", it is new. Thanks Amazon! This set was a great deal, and real nice clubs for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Mad for MTB

customer_reviews.title: Significant Improvement to your game
customer_reviews.text: These are great clubs for the money. All of my golfing partners try these out and can't believe how good they are. Most folks are especially impressed on how well the drivers work. If you aren't a professional, give them a try. Incredible upgrade from used, 25-year old clubs. Really does make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set you can confidently use with coworkers/friends without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.text: Not one to usually leave reviews but these definitely deserve it. I’m no avid golfer but these have impressed me from the very beginning. They were packaged very nicely (wrapped individually). After taking them out of the box I was immediately impressed. They do not feel “cheap” by any means. Also, I failed to notice in the description that the bag has its own tripod stand so that was a cool surprise. After taking them to the range, I was even more impressed. I’m 5’ 10” and these fit me great. Every club felt/hit great without any issues. I don’t think you’ll find a better value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: matt mueller

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this is the second set of Strata clubs we have purchased. I bought my husband a set last year. My son is starting golf this coming year for high school. Upon arriving we inspected the set. Noticing a defect on the 5H club, I called Callaway and a replacement has been sent. My son loves these clubs. He said they feel great and he can't wait to use them all summer and this golf season. I recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jes Mann

customer_reviews.title: Blown away.
customer_reviews.text: Could not believe how well I played with these clubs. I’m not necessarily a beginner but I’m not great by any means. You definitely need a 56 degree wedge to add, but I chipped in for the first time ever with the pitching wedge. The 3 wood was my go to - I did not even touch driver. I played 3 rounds since I received on Sunday and they were all pretty decent. I played better with these then my Cobra One Length set I paid over $1K for. Overall great product and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set with one exception.
customer_reviews.text: I have been quite happy with my clubs after a bad start. Shortly after I received the clubs I took them to the driving range and after hitting about 15 tee shots the driver the head flew off. I returned the the set and got the same set and this time the head has stayed on. It is quite oversized and immediately improved my driving game. The rest of the clubs are fine except the hybrid has not lived up to expectations. I would have preferred a traditional 5 iron. I have been using older garage sale type clubs so these are much better and fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginners set--comes with everything you need and the bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice beginners set--comes with everything you need and the bag is of decent quality. I usually wait a minimum of six months before writing any review in order to fully test a product and its durability.
customer_reviews.author: The Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this set for my dad for Father's Day today, and he absolutely loves it. The bag is of great quality, and every club was wrapped individually which I was surprised with. The only thing I wanted to make a note for future buyers is that in different places in the description, they advertise either a 4-hybrid and a 5-hybrid. Take note that the club is a 5-hybrid in the bag, not a 4. Overall, this set is amazing for the price. Would absolutely recommend this set for anyone looking to buy somewhat of a beginner set.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Gress

customer_reviews.title: great durable clubs for the price
customer_reviews.text: these clubs are great for the price and provide a full set to get you on the course to play. I have played multiple times with these clubs and have been satisfied with the feel and grip. Clubs are of quality material for the valued price. Bag is of great quality and has many large pockets.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. The bag itself is worth the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. The bag itself is worth the price of this set. The clubs are mainly for beginners and I have replaced most of the clubs in the set over the last year. Nothing wrong with the clubs it came with, I just wanted to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: I am a novice golfer and I really like the clubs
customer_reviews.text: I am a novice golfer and I really like the clubs. The quality is better than expected and they actually make the ball easier to hit straight. The only thing the set lacks is you can tell the bag is made out of cheaper materials. It should last as long as you are not too rough throwing it in and out of the car. If I experience any negatives I will update the review
customer_reviews.author: Jarred Felt

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Same as many other poor reviews. Fairway head flew off within the first use. Very disappointed and have tried to contact seller for replacement. No response from them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: first set, well worth it. love the putter, other reviews scared me...
customer_reviews.text: personally can attest that the heads of my clubs are all still intact after golfing. nice set, no problems, shipping was stupid fast. The set is supprisingly light weight. I was able to store a bag of tees, 60 balls, 3 16 ounce beverages, and a pair of shoes in the bag all at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Luke MacFarland

customer_reviews.title: Decent set
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent set for beginners, but just like a lot of people here, my son used the driver one time and put a huge dent in it? Really.... The rest of the set seems to be holding up okay. We went out and purchased a different driver form play it again sports...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: These were awful! Gave to my 19 year old son for Christmas. He used the driver once took 3 shots and it was all dented! Had to return. Very disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set!!
customer_reviews.text: Joined my first league this year and needed something to replace the old garage sale pieced together set I had been using. I’ve been pretty happy with my choice. A very affordable set for first time golfers like myself. As I discovered later in the year, having a sand or lob wedge is a valuable tool to have in your bag. This set does not include either off those clubs so I would recommend that you buy one to add to this set. Overall a great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these
customer_reviews.text: These are garbage. After one use the driver was completely deformed. I sent them back. Do yourself a favor and get some decent used clubs.
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: Nice clubs at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on these. Just getting back into golf. The woods were a real surprise. I thought they felt light but they have good contact and distance for an old guy like me.- The mid irons were very good with balance and good distance. The lower irons I can't fault because that is the bad part of my game.
customer_reviews.author: consumer 4

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price! My son become part of his highschool team and I didn’t want to pay a crazy price specially not knowing if he will stay playing golf. This set came fast and with a great price tag! After almost 2 month of using it 5 times a week they are holding excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Neris

customer_reviews.title: Much better
customer_reviews.text: As I did not find significant comments on the putter I'll address this first. I find it a fantastic putter allowing for accuracy in distance and ideal alignment lines. It is almost a mini mallet style which is great compared to my last putter. The irons play great and the 5 hybrid is nice for 200 yds for me. I have not used the driver or wood yet as I'm using a different model for this purpose. All this said I'm a beginner and shaved several strokes off my game with this set with the biggest difference being the putter and solid irons.
customer_reviews.author: bandaidman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set of clubs
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs! Very forgiving. Good quality. Grips feel great. Bag is of good construction. Have had this set out on the course several times with no complaints. Some reviews say that driver heads are flying off of these and shafts are breaking....to those reviews I say, stop hitting the ground with the club when you don't have a good drive. I have had no issues with quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mason M.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I've gone to the driving range with these ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've gone to the driving range with these a couple times and they work way better than my old clubs. Can't wait to get on the course with them and try them out.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McCombs

customer_reviews.title: great first set
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my college aged son. He really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: tibbs

customer_reviews.title: seem like good quality clubs
customer_reviews.text: Will be using them today for the first time. Clubs feel good with practice swing. the 5-hybrid has some rough edges on its underside from the machining but their facing away from the direction of the swing so it should not pose any issue. will update after the 18 hole game today
customer_reviews.author: jtown82

customer_reviews.title: Excellent starter set!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I haven't played in 20 years, so getting back into the game was kind of daunting. These clubs made it super easy. It's a great starter set. There are a few clubs I would like to add to it, like a 5 and 3 irons, but for what you pay for it there's no complaining. I would highly recommend these clubs. Great bag. Head covers. Can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for these clubs. They seem very well made, and the bag is great too. Definitely an upgrade from what I had, and at this price for clubs from Callaway it's a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Brave Sir Robin

customer_reviews.title: ... I will preface by saying that I'm not very good at it either
customer_reviews.text: I really don't play golf often so I will preface by saying that I'm not very good at it either. However I took them to the driving range and found that I love these clubs. I'm really not good at driving the ball but I'll tell you that this 1 wood has me driving pretty straight on out to 225 yards! It's missing a few irons, but for the price, I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: carp0331

customer_reviews.title: One club damaged during shipping
customer_reviews.text: One of the clubs, the 5H, arrived with a gouge out of the face about 1 cm long and 1 mm deep. Would definitely impact ball flight. Needs to be replaced. I submitted a Product Support request, we will see what happens next.
customer_reviews.author: CBreese

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and nice balance. Plenty of storage. A goo value over what was offered at the sporting goods stores.
customer_reviews.author: WH123

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Clubs
customer_reviews.text: First off, I read the reviews about other's club breaking within the first time using. I think those customers probably do not know how to swing a club. My clubs did not break and i play 3-5 times a week from driving course to playing a round of golf. I purchased these for a charity tournament to play in. I was able to go a full 18 course without any problem. The clubs are good for beginners. If you are more experienced then i suggest buying other club sets or building your own. The only thing that would have made this set great would be a Sand Wedge. I highly suggest you should give these a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great complete set (almost) for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: As a beginning golfer, this is a great set and very good price. All of the clubs and bag appear well made and hit very well. They feel very comfortable and are very forgiving. I'm not an expert (yet) so I can't critique them in any detail. But, I am very happy with them. The only thing missing is a sand wedge. But, other than that, I think I will enjoy this set for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Of all the clubs, I love the hybrid 5 best. It really hammers the ball, especially out of the rough along the fairways, which I visit fairly often. The irons and putter and fairway woods also seem very good. I'm not sure about the driver, as shots seem to drift but that is probably just me having to get used to it. All in all very happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Carruth

customer_reviews.title: Huge dent in driver upon second trip to driving range
customer_reviews.text: You certainly get what you pay for. Second visit to driving range resulted in driver with large dent underneath after a 'topped it' shot. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: WVU1776

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely buy
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs for any level. Ma dle well and lightweight, sharp looking set and bad. Added a Callaway 60 wedge. Gonna keep adding pieces, but this will get me there
customer_reviews.author: john quigley

customer_reviews.title: great value set
customer_reviews.text: i bought this as my first set of clubs. They are great. About a half inch short of most standard clubs which helped with control. I have since bought a new set of way more expensive clubs but I am still able to achieve some of my best shots with these clubs. I would say buy the full set and keep them for a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Tbulkhead

customer_reviews.title: Good price for what you get
customer_reviews.text: I just started golfing this year, and this set of clubs is a fairly good price for what's in the box. Compared to prices I've seen for individual clubs on the internet, it was a obvious to go for a 12 piece for me. Only thing I can recommend over getting this set is getting second-hand clubs at a thrift store or a garage sale when you're a complete beginner. Though, it's hard to beat the price tag on 12 brand new clubs, a bag, and a couple head covers.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Have played four rounds of golf with the new clubs and very happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: Asked for these clubs for a birthday present. They replaced clubs that I had for over 25 years. Have played four rounds of golf with the new clubs and very happy with the results. The driver is really forgiving and more shots within the fairway. Adjusting to using the clubs compared to what I previously had and I am making better shots. Putter is nice. Recommend these clubs for anyone wanting to get back into playing or just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Black

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter clubs
customer_reviews.text: Good starter clubs I love the driver great action and a lot of flex. I only wish that the 3 wood had a graphite shaft to match the driver.
customer_reviews.author: Gilley

customer_reviews.title: Good value for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clubs for a person who golfs occasionally. Lowest iron is a 6. All the clubs seem to be of good quality. I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic clubs.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first club set and the clubs have been great. You can't beat this price for the quality of the clubs. I have had no issues at all with the clubs or the bag. I would recommend purchasing a lob or sand wedge to add into this set, as the pitching wedge is not always a catch-all for those close shots.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter golf set
customer_reviews.text: Nice starter golf set. Includes cover and stand. Clubs easily fit my husband who is 5'10". They do seem to have a bit of a tendancy to hit the ball to the left..... (just kidding, that's my husbands fault). Has 2 woods a hybrid, and a good selection of irons and a nice putter included. Bag has good space and a backpack type strap to carry the clubs with.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter set to get me introduced to the game of golf. I plan to upgrade at some point once I get in some months of practice in and feel comfortable with the need to spend the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Dean

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced! Husband was soooo happy!
customer_reviews.text: My 6’2 Husband loved it but had to purchase other clubs such as: sand wedge, four iron, five iron! Hope that helps other wives! I was worried about him being too tall for the sticks but they work great for him!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Casso

customer_reviews.title: Dad loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My 80-year old father decided he needed new clubs after using the same set for the past 30 years. These were perfect for him and he loves them. As advertised and have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This set is what I was expecting, I am just starting out golf and still learning, but the golf sets fairly light, and easy to use while practicing on the range. Good quality and I don't have any issue with it yet. I will continue to learn and maybe upgrade some iron and drivers along the way, but I do recommend using this set for those that are starting out to play golf.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, size was perfect for 6ft male.
customer_reviews.text: Great starter clubs, the bag is durable and I have not had any issues at all. Doesnt increase my golf game buts that's the bad back! Which the cool carry straps make easy.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the money, Ordered for my husband and he was very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: susan d

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect new set of clubs. Good grips nice lightweight bag. Taken them out twice for 18 holes with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Biffle35

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs
customer_reviews.text: I love these clubs. Only club I don't care for is the putter, every other club in the bag is amazing. Although I do wish it came with a long iron.
customer_reviews.author: mpyers

customer_reviews.title: Good set for the price
customer_reviews.text: My regret it did not come with a sand wedge, other wise a nice set of clubs.
customer_reviews.author: James Smith

customer_reviews.title: Decent set for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son for Xmas. He hasn't used them yet. Will update in the spring. They seem decent for a beginner and for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The woods and irons have been working very well for me compared to the Sam Snead clubs I used three decades ago. I really like that the bag is light and has the stand.
customer_reviews.author: SoapsLuva

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. I’m not a beginner, but it has been 35 years since I golfed. This set is fairly complete, the only thing I’ve added is my old chipper. I’m really enjoying the game again!
customer_reviews.author: Donald C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I golf two or three times a year and these are great for what I need them for.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Getting back into golf. Not disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Cant imagine better starter set. Been decades since I last held club. Wow have things improved. Felt confident immediately after several swings. No complaints except wish bag said Calloway instead of Strata.
customer_reviews.author: abcdefg

customer_reviews.title: Nice Clubs for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Our teenage son has been out golfing a handful of times and said that he feels these clubs are a good weight and set for a beginner like himself.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgid Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner set
customer_reviews.text: I literally put a golf ball into orbit with the driver this morning. Be careful, these may be a bit too good. In all seriousness for the money you can’t go wrong, I was torn between these and the comparable Top Elite and after golfing with a buddy who has the Top Elite 12 pc set these feel better quality wise. Spend the extra $30 and get something like these that will last a few good years
customer_reviews.author: Garrett A.

customer_reviews.title: All clubs dent/chip/scratch very easy. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fairway wood club head broke off after about 10 uses. All clubs dent/chip/scratch very easy. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: A great begginer set
customer_reviews.text: For the price you really can't beat this set. A step above the top flite sets. It's well made and for me at least, has held up well to a solid year of beginners golf.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Honest review
customer_reviews.text: Honest review - I’m newer to golf so I was lookin for a good starter set. Everything is awesome to start out EXCEPT the driver sucks. It dented on my first swing and just got worse from there. The irons work great, just know that the driver will do you no good. I used the 3 wood for 17 holes and it was alright but now I need a new driver after 1 hole.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Vanderwarker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of clubs. Would have liked a 5 iron and the driver isn’t that good. Overall very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NC review

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Good second or beginner set. Had to upgrade/replace the driver though. Warped at the range when lent out to someone. Afterwards the ball flight path was inconsistent. All the other clubs are quality for this price though.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Best Cheap Set of Clubs Period
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cheap but quality set of clubs and these are it. I couldn't ask for anything more. I got exactly what I wanted and they perform quite well. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for anyone 5'7"
customer_reviews.text: The clubs are too long for anyone under 5'7". I am 5'7" and the reviews and advertisement stated that these clubs would fit anyone from 5'6" to 6'2". The putter is the worse fit of all of them for someone my height. I can deal with the long woods and hybrids, but the putter is just too long for me.
customer_reviews.author: chiflado

customer_reviews.title: great for a beginner golfer, probably a moderate golfer as well!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my hubby for Fathers Day. He had never golfed before so I figured the bar was set pretty low. He loves these! Now he loves golf. Just a minor complaint by him, the bag is not a cart bag, more of a carry bag, so it is a little quirky to set/keep it in the cart. stand is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Precious Kunkin

customer_reviews.title: great set of clubs
customer_reviews.text: they are light weight, has all of the club that you could ever need. well made.
customer_reviews.author: cm8929

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Worked well enough but came with a massive dent in the back of one of the drivers so I decided to return the set.
customer_reviews.author: David Doria

customer_reviews.title: Good value,  quality
customer_reviews.text: Good beginner set for the price. My 12 year old uses these and has beat the hell out of the driver but still holding strong.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it doesn’t come with a sand wedge. I immediately bought a sand wedge because I feel that it makes things a lot easier when out playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Not the highest quality driver but a great set to start with and move up from there. First time I took to the driving range I put a dent on the driver. Again, not the best quality but good for Black Friday price of $150
customer_reviews.author: I Lo

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first year golfer , these clubs are working great,, good starting set..
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: My first official set. This came with everything I needed and is rather solid for the cost. My friends I play with have been playing for a long time and even they were testing them out. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfortable Glove
customer_reviews.text: I recently took up golf and got myself a decent set of golf clubs. My co-worker recommended a glove so I decided to pick this one up. I really liked the way it feels and the added grip it provides when you are swinging the golf club. I highly recommend this glove
customer_reviews.author: Cesar G

customer_reviews.title: Missing Head Cover
customer_reviews.text: I received my Strata Set and love it but a club cover for the 5 hybrid is missing. How do I get one? I would hate to return the whole set for a head cover. Callaway Men's Strata Set (12-Piece, Right Hand)
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: ... for me for my birthday and these clubs are amazing especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend got these for me for my birthday and these clubs are amazing especially for the price. The bag is also great and has enough pockets for extra balls, tees, and other golf supplies or tools.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Alderson

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes so far! It was a Christmas gift and he’s only used them a couple of times but he said he has no complaints! He is a beginner at golf and said they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Love these clubs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as I was getting back into golf to replace my mismatched collection of second hand clubs. Great set, however I am still bad.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Bishop

customer_reviews.title: but they seem fit me just fine (in fact I swing the Strata driver better than ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner golfer and this is the first set of clubs that I have purchased. I was a little wary of them being standard length as I am 6'3", but they seem fit me just fine (in fact I swing the Strata driver better than the +1 driver my friend gave me). So far the clubs have held up well from my abysmal swings. Couldn't be happier! Overall I would recommend for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: D. Black

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: The drive is great, it has a nice feel and a ping! sound as it launches a ball out there. Overall a nice set for the average golfer
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Saniscalchi

customer_reviews.title: Great complete set
customer_reviews.text: Value! Made by Callaway. Great complete set. Bought as a gift and he loves them. For a great starting set or that extra set for the guests at the summer house.
customer_reviews.author: carl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for new golfer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginner golfer. I got these because I want to start golfing. I have since gone out 6 times and they are lightweight and just as good as any expensive clubs I have ever borrowed from a friend. Set is missing a sand wedge but that’s part of the low cost. All other clubs not included I haven’t missed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully packaged, look brand new and great price!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my grandson. He is thrilled to have a complete set.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Schellhorn

customer_reviews.title: All clubs are still in great condition Would recommend to any starter golfer
customer_reviews.text: Works well for me. I started playing golf two months ago. Though as all starters know, before you really get in the game, you take a while to really know if the game is for you. I had my eyes on this set for 2 years. Finally I bought it. All clubs are still in great condition Would recommend to any starter golfer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Callaway Men's Strata Complete Golf Set (12 Piece)
product_meta.description: A Full Set With A Great Combination Of Distance and Forgiveness Right Out Of The Box. Offers the performance men want for their game and an eye-catching look that suits their style. This set comes with 12 pieces (9 clubs, 2 headcovers, and 1 bag).
feature_bullets: Driver & 3 Wood: Woods have a forgiving sweet spot and a graphite shaft for exceptional distance (2 clubs & 2 headcovers)
IRONS/WEDGES Perimeter weighting, progressive sole width technology for improved control
HYBRIDS Designed for versatility and forgiveness on shots where you would usually hit a difficult long iron (Headcovers included)
PUTTER Mallet with T Style alignment to help give you incredible accuracy
STAND BAG The lightweight, durable stand bag comes with five convenient pockets, an additional cooler pocket, a rain hood and a backpack strap system

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
